missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a facedown terminal ({I}) to try and release a docking clamp, discarding the terminal. During the test, that figure may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The mission will progress at the start of a Status Phase if both terminals are discarded and all heroes are adjacent to the speeder. Ignore blocking terrain for this adjacency. When the mission progresses, remove <color="red">Ahsoka Tano</color> from the map.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rush into the street toward your shuttle as a large complement of troops moves to head you off. Holding the Bardottan sphere shard in your hand, you feel a connection to the Force like nothing you've felt before. As Ahsoka ignites both lightsabers, she simply offers you a nod to indicate that she’s ready.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Deploy <color="red">Ahsoka Tano</color> (Rebel Instigator) to the red highlighted space. Heroes control her as an ally.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.

eventActions.tbText:
Your speeder waits at the far side of the plaza. It looks intact, but the Imperial forces have attached mobile docking clamps to it, grounding it. The clamps appear to be controlled by two security stations.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a facedown terminal ({I}) to try and release a docking clamp, discarding the terminal. During the test, that figure may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The terminal controls the port docking clamps that hold the speeder down.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and release a docking clamp, discarding the terminal. During the test, that figure may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.

The terminal controls the starbord docking clamps that hold the speeder down.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and release a docking clamp, discarding the terminal. During the test, that figure may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.

Your getaway shuttle waits here.

{-} The mission will progress at the start of a Status Phase if both terminals are discarded and all heroes are adjacent to the shuttle. Ignore blocking terrain for this adjacency.

eventActions.tbText:
Shard in hand, you ready your weapons, determined to let no Imperial forces stop you from getting off the planet.

{-} The mission will progress at the start of a Status Phase if both terminals are discarded and all heroes are adjacent to the shuttle. Ignore blocking terrain for this adjacency. When the mission progresses, remove <color="red">Ahsoka Tano</color> from the map.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
The engines of Ahsoka’s shuttle fire, hurling you off Coruscant, leaving the enraged Emperor behind. You blast into hyperspace, breathing a sigh of relief.

Back at Alliance headquarters, a celebration is held in your honor. Ahsoka and other Rebellion leaders meet to examine the Bardottan sphere shard and decide its fate. In the end, it is determined to be too dangerous to use, but Ahsoka convinces the others not to
destroy it.

A task force is assembled, and the artifact is taken to a remote corner of the galaxy - even you do not know its final hiding place. There is still a long war ahead, but you rest well knowing you have ensured the shard cannot be used for evil, and in doing so have struck a strong blow for the Rebellion.

{-} The Rebels win the campaign!

The victorious Emperor cackles a mirthless laugh as you kneel in submission before him, unable to move. “You sorry, foolish rebels,” he sneers, holding the last remnant of the Bardottan sphere in his hand. “You have been useful pawns in my designs, and I must thank you for making my acquisition of this powerful artifact possible.” In the sky above you can see Ahsoka’s shuttle forced to retreat by an squadron of TIE fighters, leaving you behind.

“I am afraid, however, that you must still pay for your crimes,” the Emperor says as the troopers close in on you and bind your hands. “Take them away,” the Emperor croaks to his troops. “We will show them the consequences for treason and sedition.” As they drag you away toward a waiting prison barge, you can see Palpatine already examining the shard and basking in its power.

{-} The Rebels lose the campaign.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to slice into the docking system.

{-} Test ({I}). Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal. During the test, you may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.

inputList.theText: The security is too tight. You need to keep trying.

events.eventText: You manage to slice into the system. With a whirr,  the docking clamps release the backboard section of the speeder.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The terminal controls the backboard docking clamps that hold the speeder down.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and release a docking clamp, discarding the terminal. During the test, that figure may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to slice into the docking system.

{-} Test ({I}). Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal. During the test, you may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.

inputList.theText: The security is too tight. You need to keep trying.

events.eventText: You manage to slice into the system. With a whirr,  the docking clamps release the backboard section of the speeder.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The terminal controls the backboard docking clamps that hold the speeder down.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and release a docking clamp, discarding the terminal. During the test, that figure may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.

events.eventText:
With the clamps released and the walker no longer threatening to shoot down your shuttle as soon as it starts, you are finally free to make your escape.

{-} At the start of a Status Phase, if all heroes are adjacent to the shuttle, click the shuttle and select "Heroes adjacent", then click "End Round". Ignore blocking terrain for this adjacency.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Your getaway shuttle waits here.

{-} At the start of a Status Phase, if all heroes are adjacent to the shuttle, select "Heroes adjacent", then click "End Round". Ignore blocking terrain for this adjacency.

events.eventText:
With loud mechanical noises, a huge combat walker comes stomping through the narrow streets of Coruscant, blasting away. One shot of that thing could easily down your speeder. As long as that walker is hear, you can't even think of escaping.

{-} The mission can't progress while the <color="red">AT-DP</color> is on the map.

eventActions.shortText: Release the docking clamps (&Clamps released&/2). Defeat the <color="red">AT-DP</color>.

events.eventText:
As you climb into your shuttle, Ahsoka calls out “I'll try to draw some of their fire," and runs off to her own ship. 

{-} Set aside all figures on the map.

eventActions.tbText: You scramble to take your places in the shuttle as you launch. {-} Each hero picks a different role for each activation token he has: Pilot, Navigator, Gunner, or Artifact Defender. {-} For each of the following tests, all Rebel figures are considered to be adjacent to, within 1 space of, and in line of sight of each other.

Your ship is only just leaving the landing pad when alarms sound and small explosions erupt in both engines. You begin losing altitute, and the only potential landing spot is a pad armed with defense systems and troops preparing to swarm over your wreckage.

eventActions.mainText:
You take aim with the shuttle's cannons.

{-} The gunner tests {I} or {J}. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: The shuttle's descend is too uncontrolled to aim. Your shots go wide, only hitting concrete walls.

You strafe the stormtroopers with the fire from your cannons.

{-} Defeat 1 Stormtrooper figure.

You strafe the stormtroopers with the fire from your cannons.

{-} Defeat 2 Stormtrooper figures.

You keep your gun trained on the stormtroopers following every movement and not stopping to fire until they all lie motionless on the ground.

{-} Defeat 3 Stormtrooper figures.

eventActions.mainText:
The shuttle engines finally deactivate, and the emergency repulsor drive kicks in. The shuttle spirals down towards the facility.

{-} The pilot tests {I} or {J}. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
The shuttle crashes to the ground, hard.

{-} Deploy the Rebels to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Each Rebel figure suffers 2 {H} (4 {H} if he is a hero with 2 activation tokens).

The shuttle crashes to the ground, but you manage to soften the impact a bit.

{-} Deploy the Rebels to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Each Rebel figure suffers 1 {H} (3 {H} if he is a hero with 2 activation tokens).

The shuttle crashes to the ground, but you manage to soften most the impact.

{-} Deploy the Rebels to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Each hero with 2 activation tokens suffers 2 {H}.

The shuttle crashes to the ground, but you manage to soften most the impact.

{-} Deploy the Rebels to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Each hero with 2 activation tokens suffers 1 {H}.

The shuttle crashes to the ground, but you activate the emergency systems just in time to soften the landing.

{-} Deploy the Rebels to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.tbText:
You crawl out of the wreck, trying to get your bearings.

{-} The navigator tests {I} or {J}, applying +2 {B} to the results. Then, for each {B}, any hero may gain 1 {e} or recover 1 {C}.

eventActions.mainText:
As you emerge from the wreckage, a dark power in the distance seems to reach for the shard.

{-} The Artifact Defender tests {K} or {I}. Enter the number of successes below.

events.eventText: The walker finally comes crashing down, collapsing in a heap of smoldering metal.
You manage to wrestle back the control over the shard.
You manage to wrestle back the control over the shard, but you cannot shake the feeling that your some dark power is still lingering within.
The shard vibrates in your hand, but you keep your fingers closed around it. Some dark power seems to be calling out.
The shard vibrates and glows in your hand, and you feel a sharp pang of pain shoot through you.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: {-} Place 1 energy shield on each purple highlighted space.
{-} Place 1 energy shield on each purple highlighted space.

eventActions.tbText:
Immediately after your crash, the Imperial facility is put under high alert. Energy shields activate to shield the entrance.

{-} Place 1 energy shield on each purple highlighted space.

eventActions.mainText:
Imperial forces gather to stop your advance.

{-} Add the total threat cost of all Imperial figures set aside from the first map section together. Enter the result below.

eventActions.tbText:
“Don't panic!” Ahsoka calls to you. “I'll get you out. Shut down that station's defenses so I can land safely and pick you up!”

{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Defense Station opens.

eventActions.theText:
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Defense Station opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
You gather around the escape shuttle and prepare to depart.

{-} Click "End Round" to progress the mission.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Your getaway shuttle waits here.

{-} The mission will progress at the start of a Status Phase if both terminals are discarded and all heroes are adjacent to the shuttle. Ignore blocking terrain for this adjacency.

events.eventText: The generator collapses in a shower of sparks.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The shield generators both protect the Defense Station and keep Ahsoka from Landing.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a shield generator (Health: 8, Defense: 2 {G}).

events.eventText: The generator collapses in a shower of sparks.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The shield generators both protect the Defense Station and keep Ahsoka from Landing.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a shield generator (Health: 8, Defense: 2 {G}).

events.eventText: The door slides open to reveal a small Defense Station with two shield generators, humming with power. Shortly after you open the door, automatic guards activate.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: A heavy blast door leads into the Defense Station.

eventActions.tbText:
The shield generators look robust, but not indestructible.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a shield generator (Health: 8, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} When the shield generators are destroyed and all heroes are on exterior spaces, the heroes are extracted.
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes are extracted.

eventActions.theText:
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack a shield generator (Health: 8, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} When the shield generators are destroyed and all heroes are on exterior spaces, the heroes are extracted.
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes are extracted.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.tbText: As you ready yourself to storm into the facility, sudden pain throbs in your heads. A sense of absolute terror descends on you. Through the shield, a pitch black shuttle descends, landing in front of the facility. Out steps a dark-robed figure that is engulfed in malice.

events.eventText:
The shield generators power down, and immediately the shields surrounding the facility collapse. "Now!", calls Ahsoka over radio. "Get out of there, I'll pick you up!"

{-} Remove all energy shields from the map.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: {-} When all heroes are on exterior spaces, click "Extract" to depart, ending the mission.

eventActions.tbText: {-} When all heroes are on exterior spaces, click the Rebel mission token and select "Extract" to depart.

eventActions.theText:
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} When all heroes are on exterior spaces, click the Rebel mission token and select "Extract" to depart.
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes are extracted.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
